transcript:
Customer: Samir ko call karne ke liye dhanyavad.
Apke phone ka jawab diya ja raha hai, kripya pratiksha karein.
Apka call mahatvapurn hai.
Kripya line par bane rahe.
Maf kijiye.
Hello
Hello
Customer: haan
Executive: Ji Samir ji baat kar rahe hain sir Prince Corp se?
Customer: haan haan bol raha hu na
Executive: Samir ji good afternoon mai Shubham baat kar raha tha IndiaMART head office se kaise hain aap?
Customer: Mai bas thik hu sir ji boliye
Executive: Ji isliye call kiya tha maine Samir ji actually aapka na discussion hua hoga Ranjit ke sath services aapki hamare sath chal rahi hai and aapne sir jo bhi wo call hui thi uska ek feedback jata hai call feedback to aapne shayad not satisfied mark kiya hai sir use right?
Customer: haan haan
Executive: To sir samajhna chah raha tha sir ki kya problem aa rahi hai employee ka kuch issue hai kya? Kyunki employee
Customer: Employee ji ka koi issue nahi hai but aapke service pe issue hai ki wo jo proper lead nahi aa rahi hai na uske karan. 6 mahine se mai 1.5 se 1.5 lakh rupya deke rakha hu. 6 mahine ho gaye to agar mere ko 50,000 ka bhi milega nahi dala hua bhi amount to matlab hi nahi hai na uske karan se frustrated hua hai wo. Matlab free wo dala hua hai.
Executive: Achha
Executive: Sir mujhe batayiye kya issue aa raha hai sir jaise lead aap consume kar rahe hain aapke paas lead nahi aa rahi hai na?
Customer: Matlab portal pe lead hi dikh nahi rahi jisse mai purchase karu.
Executive: Portal pe lead hi nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi aa rahi hai jo ki proper buyer ho uske.
Executive: Ek second rukiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm
Executive: Achha mujhe ye batayiye jaise ek main round neck sublimation t-shirt karke 10 piece ki ye is buylead ka kaisa kya hai sir ye matlab ho sakti hai hamare kaam ki ya nahi ho sakti hai?
Customer: Ek minute mai system pe aata hu.
Executive: Please open kar lijiye.
Customer: haan boliye kaha pe bolu?
Executive: Pehli buylead dekhiye aap relevant mein dekhenge to aapko 10 piece ki ek main round neck sublimation t-shirt ki dikhegi.
Customer: haan main round neck sublimation t-shirt
Customer: haan haan
Customer: Actually dekhiye na abhi ye 10-10 piece ka karenge na to apne ko 1.5 lakh rupya apne dale hai na to aise 10-10 pieces wala inquiry uthayenge to kab niklega batayiye mujhe.
Executive: Kitna MOQ kitna rehta hai sir apna kitna MOQ hai ye batayiye?
Customer: Apna minimum quantity 50 rahega t-shirts to kar lete hai.
Executive: 50 t-shirt bhi agar koi mang raha hai to hum log kar lete hai.
Customer: haan 50 ke niche nahi karte.
Executive: Ek second call pe rukiye aur sir t-shirt hi hai keval jaise cap vap mein bhi aapne liya hai to cap vap mein mera t-shirts mein bhi cap cap mein bhi dono mein star package liya hua hai.
Executive: Aapne ji bilkul t-shirt printing services mein star liya hua hai aur aapne promotional cap mein liya hua hai.
Customer: haan haan
Executive: Isme na jo main main plain t-shirts hai wo bhi deal karte hai kya jo plain t-shirts hoti hai sir?
Customer: haan koi printing wale mangte hai to wo bhi dete hai.
Executive: To mai ek kaam karta hu ek to kuch categories rehti hai jisme aap buyleads consume kar rahe hain wo add nahi hai usme main plain t-shirt, round neck t-shirt, round neck main t-shirt ye teen categories mai add kar deta hu isme teeno mein aap buylead consumption kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: Nahi wo to abhi dekhiye ye ye to abhi Ranjit ji 6 mahine se wahi kar rahe hai kaunsa add kar rahe hai kaunsa nikal rahe hai to unko bhi jyada malum nahi shayad iske bare mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi samajh gaya dusra mujhe ye to maine ek cheez batayiye sir abhi meri call khatam nahi hui hai dusra bhi ja raha hu sir buyleads ke upar bhi.
Customer: hmm one second rukiye.
Executive: Ji
Executive: Ek second ho jayiye sir please
Executive: Ab mujhe ye batayiye sir jaise mai leads dekh pa raha hu kuch leads aisi bhi hai jaise 200 piece ki ek lead aayi thi dry fit t-shirt.
Customer: haan
Executive: Maharashtra Palgarh ki to ye halaki sold out lead hai 10 minute pehle aayi thi ye lead hame mili hame mil payi ye lead?
Customer: Ye wo Palgarh ki na nahi nahi ye portal mein dikhi dikhai nahi mere ko.
Executive: Dikha to hoga sir actually kya ho sakta hai ki ye ye jarur possibility hai ki us time pe aap online na ho portal pe har buylead aati hai sir.
Customer: Mai wahi bata raha hu ki portal pe har buylead aati hai lekin kabhi kabhi to purchase karne ke baad bhi nahi milti hai kabhi kabhi to jab jati hai kuch pata hi nahi hum log refresh karte baithe rehte hai usme wo kabhi nikal jati hai pata bhi nahi chalta. Achha dusra ek aur cheez mai dekh pa raha hu ki sir buyleads hum jaise 300 300 buyleads hum consume kar rahe hain.
Customer: haan
Executive: To jo consume leads hai unka kaisa response hai sir jo consume to hum sir jaise consume leads mai dekh raha hu to consume jo mai to daily ka data bhi deta raha hu na unko Ranjit ji ko mai daily deta data de raha hu matlab ki kitne call per day hue aur kitne mein kitna connect hue wo khud trial bhi kiye mere sath do teen bar ki din mein hum log agar 13 14 log ko purchase kar rahe hai to ek se do log khali call uthate hai aur usme bhi wo batate hai ki nahi humko koi interested nahi hai. Wo khud Ranjit ji ne do bar try teen bar try bhi kiye hai mere sath.
Customer: Matlab call karne ke baad ye bol de rahe hai ki humne hamari koi interest nahi hai baki matlab jaise aap abhi cross check kar rahe hai na waise Ranjit ji mere sath call pe baithe hum log ek ek call number pe aur unko maine record bhi bheja hai har mahine ka matlab sorry teen mahine ka last ka bheja bhi tha to unhone bola ki category hatana hai fir category bhi hata ke ek mahina ho gaya.
Customer: Abhi recently humne pichle week ke Friday mein hi humne check kiya to bhi unhone dekha ki 13 14 number mein se khali do log se baat hua aur do log ka bhi yahi concern tha ki humne by mistake click kiya tha.
Executive: Sir mai ek kaam kar leta hu aapne mere ko bata diya.
Executive: Mai ek bar na Ranjit se baat kar leta hu actually aaj Ranjit available nahi hai. Mai ek bar Ranjit se baat kar leta hu uske baad usse resolution karata hu apart from this hmm hmm basically ye tha sir ki aapka jo feedback aaya tha sir mere paas wo actually Ranjit ke liye aaya tha Ranjit ki calls thi to uske liye aaya tha mera personal number mai aapke sath share kar dena ek bar apna number batayiye please mere ko.
Customer: 94 94 0523
Executive: 0523 1162
Executive: Dekhiye maine hello dala hai sir aapko.
Customer: haan ye mera personal number hai
Executive: Shubham naam hai sir mera rukiye mai naam likh deta hu.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai sir ji mai save kar leta hu nahi Ranjit ji actually unko wo to support kar hi rahe hai lekin kya hai na sir ji portal mein jo lead nahi aa rahi hai na uske karan hi mera problem hai aur kuch nahi hai.
Executive: Samajh gaya samajh gaya samajh gaya mai ek bar Ranjit se baat kar leta hu ek bar wo to kar hi rahe hai support kiya aisa karo waisa karo wo to har time support kar rahe hai pata hai mujhe sir wo kaam karta hai mai ek bar usse baat kar leta hu actually aaj wo available nahi hai parso meri baat hogi kal Guru Nanak Jayanti ki chutti hai.
Customer: Achha kal bhi band hai aapka? Okay
Executive: haan kal sir Guru Nanak Jayanti ka off hai. Mai parso aap se connect karunga usse baat karne ke baad parso ke baad resolution karata hu baki apart from this ye ticket mai close kar de raha hu kyunki sir ye uske liye open hua tha employee ka ticket rehta hai to employee ya rating ka ticket hai wo agar aap employee se satisfied hai to sir mai close kar de raha hu.
Customer: Thik hai thik hai thik hai okay okay thank you so much sir thank you
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting proper buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with the service due to low lead quality.

- Expresses frustration with recurring issues.



Resolution:

- Executive added main plain t-shirt category.

- Executive assured to connect with Ranjit for resolution.

- Executive shared his personal number with the customer.

- Executive offered to close the employee rating ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect with customer after talking to Ranjit.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, resolution, support
